statements: SELECT * FROM visitor_footfall;
SELECT visitor_id, visit_date, visit_time FROM visitor_footfall WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT location, visitor_id, is_new_visitor FROM visitor_footfall WHERE visit_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT site_id, visitor_id, visit_date, visit_time, duration_minutes FROM visitor_footfall WHERE is_new_visitor = TRUE;
SELECT visitor_id, location FROM visitor_footfall WHERE visit_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM visitor_footfall WHERE visit_date = '2022-10-12';
SELECT visitor_id, site_id, visit_time, location FROM visitor_footfall WHERE site_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(duration_minutes) AS avg_duration, is_new_visitor FROM visitor_footfall GROUP BY is_new_visitor HAVING is_new_visitor = TRUE;
SELECT site_id, COUNT(visitor_id) AS total_visitors FROM visitor_footfall GROUP BY site_id HAVING total_visitors > 10 ORDER BY total_visitors DESC;
SELECT site_id, visitor_id, visit_date, MAX(duration_minutes) AS max_duration FROM visitor_footfall GROUP BY site_id, visitor_id, visit_date ORDER BY site_id ASC, max_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitor_footfall;
SELECT site_id, visit_timestamp FROM visitor_footfall WHERE visitor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT site_id, COUNT(visitor_id) AS total_visitors FROM visitor_footfall GROUP BY site_id;
SELECT * FROM tourist_sites WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY site_name ASC;
SELECT site_name, city, country FROM tourist_sites WHERE country = 'Japan';
SELECT * FROM tourist_sites WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT site_name, country, city FROM tourist_sites WHERE country = 'Italy' AND city = 'Rome';
SELECT * FROM visitor_footfall WHERE visit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND visit_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT visitor_id, site_name, city, country FROM visitor_footfall JOIN tourist_sites ON visitor_footfall.site_id = tourist_sites.site_id;
SELECT site_name, city, count(visitor_id) as visitor_count FROM visitor_footfall JOIN tourist_sites ON visitor_footfall.site_id = tourist_sites.site_id GROUP BY site_id ORDER BY visitor_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM visitor_sites;
SELECT site_name, visitors_count FROM visitor_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, visitors_count FROM visitor_sites ORDER BY visitors_count DESC;
SELECT site_name, visitors_count FROM visitor_sites WHERE site_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT site_name, visitors_count FROM visitor_sites WHERE visitors_count > 1000;
SELECT * FROM visitor_sites WHERE visitors_count > 100 ORDER BY site_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT site_name, visitors_count FROM visitor_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT visit_time, visitor_id FROM visitor_records WHERE site_id = 3 ORDER BY visit_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT site_name, total_visitors, peak_hours FROM visitor_analytics WHERE total_visitors > 500 ORDER BY peak_hours ASC;

SELECT site_name, visitors_count, total_visitors FROM visitor_sites JOIN visitor_analytics ON visitor_sites.site_id = visitor_analytics.site_id WHERE visitors_count > 50 ORDER BY total_visitors DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM visitor_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM visitor_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, COUNT(visitor_id) AS total_visitors FROM visitor_sites JOIN visitor_logs ON visitor_sites.site_id = visitor_logs.site_id GROUP BY site_name;
SELECT visitor_id, entry_time FROM visitor_logs ORDER BY entry_time DESC;
SELECT site_name, average_age FROM site_statistics JOIN visitor_sites ON site_statistics.site_id = visitor_sites.site_id;
SELECT * FROM visitor_sites;
SELECT site_name, location FROM visitor_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, entry_time FROM visitor_logs WHERE visitor_id = 1001;
SELECT site_name, total_visitors FROM visitor_sites JOIN site_statistics ON visitor_sites.site_id = site_statistics.site_id;
SELECT visitor_id, age, gender FROM visitor_demographics WHERE age >= 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM VisitorRecords;
SELECT visitor_id, visit_date, visit_duration FROM VisitorRecords WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, city, country FROM TouristSites WHERE city = 'Paris';
SELECT site_id, avg_daily_footfall, peak_footfall_time FROM SiteAnalytics ORDER BY avg_daily_footfall DESC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visitor_gender FROM VisitorProfiles WHERE visitor_age > 30 AND visitor_gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM VisitorRecords WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, city FROM TouristSites ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT visitor_id, visitor_name, visitor_age FROM VisitorProfiles WHERE visitor_gender = 'M';
SELECT site_id, avg_daily_footfall FROM SiteAnalytics WHERE avg_daily_footfall > 500 ORDER BY avg_daily_footfall DESC;
SELECT s.site_name, f.footfall_count, f.footfall_date FROM TouristSites s INNER JOIN SiteFootfall f ON s.site_id = f.site_id ORDER BY f.footfall_count DESC, f.footfall_date ASC;
